texts: I'm Cristina Stoian, a passionate and driven junior frontend developer with a strong enthusiasm for creating engaging and user-friendly web experiences. With a background in multiple trainings, online courses and self-study, I am eager to contribute to innovative projects and collaborate with like-minded professionals.
I've had the opportunity to work on a variety of projects, including building responsive websites, developing user interfaces, and implementing interactive features.

In this portfolio, you'll find a collection of projects that showcase my expertise and creativity. Each project represents a journey of problem-solving and exploration, demonstrating my commitment to delivering high-quality, user-centric solutions. I believe in the power of technology to make a positive impact on the world, and I'm excited to share my contributions with you. Thank you for visiting, and I hope you enjoy exploring my work!
